articles.title: Los Angeles Dodgers starter Walker Buehler will have season-ending elbow surgery next week
articles.description: Los Angeles starter Walker Buehler, who was targeting a mid-September return to the rotation, will have season-ending elbow surgery next week and miss the playoffs, the Dodgers announced on Monday.
